text: Lechia is a genus of spiders in the family Salticidae (jumping spiders). ==Species== , the World Spider Catalog accepted two species: *Lechia minuta (Prószyński, 1992) – India *Lechia squamata Żabka, 1985 – China, Vietnam ==References== Category:Salticidae Category:Salticidae genera
title: Lechia (spider)
